response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. Our product, which has been meticulously crafted and tailored to excellence, offers unparalleled value and functionality. I believe it could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a price of $850,000. This represents a substantial saving compared to the market value, making it an attractive proposition for you. I look forward to discussing how this product can benefit you and your endeavors. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 850000}
